name: Run to Marble Race
description:
RUN TO MARBLE RACE

Push your marble to the Marble Race that is starting!

React with good timing to increase your speed and reach the finish line as fast as you can!

  • 3 single player modes: Time Attack, Race and Tournament
  • Over 100 Skins available
  • Over 90 in-game missions
  • Defeat your friends in the Global Leaderboard
  • Obtain Google's Achievements

Contact Us: wedevis.games@gmail.com
